title: F1 bosses agree contract to stage Miami Grand Prix in 2021
text:
Formula One bosses have agreed a contract to stage the Miami Grand Prix from May 2021.

Sportsmail can reveal that the deal in principle is with Hard Rock Stadium — the multi-purpose home of the Dolphins NFL team north of the city.

However, Miami-Dade County still need to approve the plans. The venue is a switch from the original proposed downtown site, which met local objections.

Formula One bosses have agreed a contract to stage the Miami Grand Prix from May 2021

The race, if voted through, will instead be held mostly in the stadium and surrounding grounds.

F1 commercial boss Sean Bratches said: ‘The GP will be an economic juggernaut for South Florida.’
description: Formula One bosses have agreed a contract to stage the Miami Grand Prix from May 2021. Sportsmail can reveal that the deal in principle is with Hard Rock Stadium.
authors: Jonathan Mcevoy For The Daily Mail
